info.description: API for document processing using TF-IDF algorithm
info.title: TF-IDF counter API

get.description: Returns all collections belonging to the authenticated user

post.description: Adds a document to several collections at once

get.description: Returns a specific collection with its documents

delete.description: Deletes a collection (does not delete documents)

get.description: Gets statistics for the collection: TF is calculated as if all documents in the collection were one document, IDF unchanged (gives top 50 most frequent words and their idf)

post.description: Adds an existing document to a collection

delete.description: Removes a document from a collection

get.description: Returns a list of all documents belonging to the authenticated user
Returns document details and content by ID

delete.description: Deletes a document by ID (both file and database record)

get.description: Encodes the document content using Huffman algorithm
get.summary: Get Huffman encoded and decoded content of a document

get.description: Calculates TF statistics for a given document, and IDF calculated as if all documents in collections, where the document we specified is, is in one collection
Retrieves aggregated metrics including processing time, file size, and top 10 most seen words
Provides the current status of the API

post.description: Uploads a file, processes it for TF and IDF, gives top 50 rare words, sets up metrics, and saves to database. Only in this case: IDF = log(total words / count)

post.summary: User login and setting JWT cookie

get.summary: Get information about the current user

get.description: Provides the current version of the application

helper.Response.description: This is the standard response format for all API endpoints
